subtitle.translate: Get your first Mechanical Press running and squish some metal

description: A /a/Mechanical Press/a/ not only makes a /d/cool noise/d/ when you /b/put metal under it/b/, but it /b/flattens the metal into sheets/b/, too!

To use the /a/Mechanical Press,/a/ you need to /b/power it with/b/ /e/Rotational Force/e/ and throw some items on /b/the block right below it/b/, whether it be on a/a/ Mechanical Belt/a/, /a/Depot/a/ /b/(I recommend the depot!)/b/, or the /c/cold hard ground/c/.
You're going to use a lot of these sheets in your Create adventures, so /b/make sure to keep this press around/b/ ;)
/7/(The Mechanical Press doesn't make *just* sheets! Right-click on the press in EMI to check out all the recipes it offers!)/7/
